segments.text: I ’ m going to be moving out soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You still have time on your lease .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s no way that I can stay here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s not going to be all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m going to have to keep your deposit
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why can ’ t I have it back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because you ’ re leaving before your lease is over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to give it back to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ re not going to get it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I ’ m not able to live here anymore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t help you with that .
segments.speaker: S2
